snippet.title: RPG Citizens Unite!: Earth x Space - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Scout Citizens and go on an absolutely comical & hilarious adventure!

Citizens Unite!: Earth x Space is a game bundle that includes two games: “Citizens of Earth” (released 2015), where the rookie Vice President and fellow Citizens investigate the strange mysteries cropping up all over Earth, and “Citizens of Space” (released 2019) where the Earth’s new Ambassador embarks on a journey to find the missing Earth with the help of Citizens across the galaxy. This time, the two adventures have united with brand-new elements. Time travel back-and-forth between “Citizens of Earth” and “Citizens of Space”, unlocking new content and revealing the true ending!

© 2021 Eden Industries Inc. Published by KEMCO.
